TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SecurityRulesAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SecurityRulesAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SecurityRulesAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示公共语言运行时应该对程序集强制的一组安全规则。

span.span: Indicates the set of security rules the common language runtime should enforce for an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示公共语言运行时应该对程序集强制执行的安全规则集。This class indicates which set of security rules the common language runtime should enforce for an assembly. 例如, 标记`[SecurityRules(SecurityRuleSet.Level1)]`为的程序集使用 .NET Framework 版本2.0 透明度规则, 在该规则中, 公共安全关键类型和成员在程序集外部被视为安全可靠关键。For example, an assembly that is marked with `[SecurityRules(SecurityRuleSet.Level1)]` uses the .NET Framework version 2.0 transparency rules, where public security-critical types and members are treated as security-safe-critical outside the assembly. 这需要安全关键类型和成员来执行完全信任的链接要求, 以便在外部调用方访问安全关键行为时强制执行该行为。This requires security-critical types and members to perform a link demand for full trust to enforce security-critical behavior when they are accessed by external callers. 通常情况下, 级别1规则只应用于兼容性, 如2.0 版程序集。Typically, level 1 rules should be used only for compatibility, such as for version 2.0 assemblies. 有关1级行为的详细信息, 请参阅[安全透明代码, 级别 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md)。For more information about level 1 behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md). 有关级别2行为的信息, 请参阅[安全透明代码, 级别 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)。For information about level 2 behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md).

related.span: .NET Framework 4.0 版中的安全性更改

span.span: Security Changes in the .NET Framework Version 4.0

param.span: 用于指定透明规则集的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the transparency rules set.

summary.span: 使用指定的规则集值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified rule set value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定`ruleSet`参数时, 请使用 .NET Framework 2.0 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]版规则或规则。When you specify the `ruleSet` parameter, use for .NET Framework version 2.0 rules or for [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] rules. 有关行为的详细信息, 请参阅[安全透明代码, 级别 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md)。For more information about behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md). 有关行为的信息, 请参阅[安全透明代码, 级别 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)。For information about behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md).

related.span: .NET Framework 4.0 版中的安全性更改

span.span: Security Changes in the .NET Framework Version 4.0

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the transparency rules to be applied.

member this.SkipVerificationInFullTrust : bool with get, set

summary.span: 确定完全信任的透明代码是否应该跳过 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 验证。

span.span: Determines whether fully trusted transparent code should skip Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) verification.

value.span: 如果应该跳过 MSIL 验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if MSIL verification should be skipped; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应仅用于优化, 因为如果代码不可验证, 则不能强制实施针对透明代码的安全保障。This property should be used only for optimization, because security guarantees made for transparent code cannot be enforced if the code is unverifiable. 如果使用此属性跳过程序集的 MSIL 验证, 请使用`/transparent` [peverify.exe 工具](~/docs/framework/tools/peverify-exe-peverify-tool.md)中的选项来静态验证程序集的透明代码是否满足类型安全要求。If you use this property to skip MSIL verification for an assembly, use the `/transparent` option in the [Peverify tool](~/docs/framework/tools/peverify-exe-peverify-tool.md) to statically verify that the assembly's transparent code meets type safety requirements.
